name: Deadly Fall
description:
Challenging and original.

You control a falling ball , trying to dodge obstacles.

The goal of the game is to reach the end of the downhill , hitting as few obstacles as possible.

You can hit the walls.

Controls:

S - start, R - restart, A - left, D - right, ESC - quit

! Please support me, I love programming games and plan to work on bigger projects. Thank you in advance :)

Credtis: Unity , DST for music.
